name: Seaside Duels
description:
"A one button timing boss rush with 8 opponents to defeat, inspired by western duels"

Play as a crab like Sheriff and duel on the seaside 8 dangerous criminals using only your left click or space bar. To win those revisited western duel you will have to press the button at the right time , the fastest and more precise duelist will win the gunfight, but beware, your enemies will try to break your focus to shoot before you do.
To finish the game you have to win all the duels without dying.
